body:
In addition to https://hub.docker.com/r/spack/ubuntu-bionic this provides an ubuntu 20.04 container recipe. I'm not suggesting that this actually gets populated on docker hub, but merely providing the recipe for those who wish to build a spack base container themselves may be useful. 

The ubuntu-1804 workaround for lua-posix is not necessary anymore in ubuntu-2004.

[Commit history refers to tutorial updates due to having originally been branched off releases/v0.16.]
title: Docker: spack/ubuntu 20.04 container recipe
